title: WTB: SGC 60 Shaughnessy from REA Set Break Auction
author: txaggie00

posts.post_title: WTB: SGC 60 Shaughnessy from REA Set Break Auction
posts.post_content:
Checking with the forum members to see if any were the successful bidders for either of the two Shaughnessey SGC 60's that were in REA's Set Break auction from February/March earlier this year.

If so, I'd be interested in purchasing either at a premium to their purchase price if they'd entertain selling.

I picked up several from that sale but narrowly missed out on Shag.

Thanks
